name: Have you seen Cubinger?
description:
Bullet Hell Jam 2021

https://itch.io/jam/bullet-jam-2021

Have you seen cubinger?

This our entry for the gamejam Bullet Hell Jam 2021, with the theme 10 SECONDS. For this gamejam, we decided to do mashup between a platform, puzzle and bullet hell, lost in the riiples of time. Con you helps us find our cat?

It was a great fun to do, and, while not complete, we are still proud of it. Enjoy our code!

You can play it here

Coding

  • The Running Mackerels Team: Portus | Indie

Assets

  • The Running Mackerels Team: Portus | Indie
  • Fonts: PixelSplitter by Manfred Klein
  • Assets created with MagicaVoxel and Blender

Sound and Music

  • All sounds and music from Freesound.org
    • Freesound - "Alien`s feast loop.wav" by zagi2
    • Freesound - "Electric zap.wav" by michael_grinnell
    • Freesound - "Sci-Fi Click" by josepharaoh99
    • Freesound - "Time Slow Down" by PatrickLieberkind
    • Freesound - "Space Weasel.wav" by BaDoink
    • Freesound - "Beam.mp3" by TheDonkey
    • Freesound - "Sci Fi - Effects - Aquapur_10.wav" by GregorQuendel
    • Freesound - "GameTinyWarp" by RICHERlandTV
    • Freesound - "Engine Dying" by josepharaoh99
    • Freesound - "Sci-Fi Two-Part Click" by josepharaoh99
  • Audacity for FX

The Running Mackerels Team
